result.execSummary:
The defendant Errol C Collins was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Discharge Firearm from Vehicle, a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 941.20(3)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Consecutive to: (CONSECUTIVE TO ANY OTHER SENTENCE), with credit for 4 days time served.

miscConds.notes:
Court orders restitution set at $0. 
Defendant shall provide a DNA sample for the Data Bank and pay all appropriate costs.
Court ordered defendant to pay all applicable court costs and surcharges. As to all costs and surcharges, Court orders amounts to be deducted form bail on deposit, remaining balance to be returned to the person who posted it.

No weapons.
Court advised defendant that as a convicted felon he may never possess a firearm or body armor.  Court advised defendant that his voting rights are suspended and he may not vote in any election until his civil rights are restored.

*No contact with residence where shooting occurred (3369 N 27th St, Milwaukee, WI).
*No new offenses that rise to the level of probable cause.

*Anger management programming.
*Any other terms and conditions deemed appropriate by the department of corrections. 
*Absolute sobriety.

timeConds.notes: With Huber release for work and childcare (REPORT DATE 6/10/16).

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Errol C Collins

Huber/Work Release Modification Request
.
Request for Huber / Work Release Modification received from HOC and filed this date.  This case is assigned and forwarded to Judge Rosa Br35 for review. os
Defendant's pro se request for good time or EM.  Received and filed (denied in order dated 7/14/2016).
- signed and filed.
Per Order of the Presiding Judge, Felony Division, this motion/request is hereby assigned to the Hon. Frederick C. Rosa, Br. 35, for review. mag
Defendant's pro se request for electronic (GPS) monitoring and good time credit.
Bail Refund Packet
Notice and affidavit mailed to surety on for bail refund. JM
- character letters (2), filed by defense.
Justice Point Pretrial Report, filed.
- sentencing submissions of defense (6 pages), filed.

Defendant Errol C Collins in court with attorney Allison Marie Ritter.  Nicholas Steven Cerwin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Defendant was advised of constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, plead GUILTY and was examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis for the plea.  Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen deportation is possible.  Court found Defendant guilty as charged in the Information and ordered entry of Judgment of Conviction.    Court ordered case adjourned for Sentencing in Branch 35.  Firearms warnings given. Voting admonishment given. DNA notification given.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for June 2, 2016 at 01:30 pm.  Court VACATED Jury Trial set for 05-02-2016.
Justice Point Pretrial Report, filed.
Justice Point Violation Report (missed telephone contact), filed.  Court takes no action.
Justice Point Pretrial Report, filed.

Defendant Errol C Collins in court with attorney Allison Marie Ritter.  Hanna Ritchie Kolberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Matter will not resovle today, Counsel requests trial date.  Final pre-trial scheduled for April 14, 2016 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for May 2, 2016 at 09:30 am.
Court defense motion to adjourn plea/sentencing hearing on 1/8/16.  State does not object.  Plea/sentencing hearing is adjourned to 1/22/16 at 8:30am.  Attorney Ritter to send confirming letter.
- to adjourn, filed by defense counsel.

Defendant Errol C Collins in court with attorney Allison Marie Ritter (by phone).  Denis John Stingl for Hanna Kolberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense counsel has a family emergency and is unable to appear personally today. Additionally, Court is in trial and unable to conduct plea and sentencing hearing today.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 8, 2016 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Report, received and filed.

Defendant Errol C Collins in court with attorney Allison Marie Ritter.  Hanna Ritchie Kolberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Ritter is requesting adjourned date to obtain additional discovery. Court grants request, plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 14, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Justice Point Pretrial Report, filed.

Defendant Errol C Collins in court with attorney Allison Marie Ritter.  Hanna Ritchie Kolberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 7.   All parties notified as of August 03, 2015 this case is assigned to Judge Rosa, Branch 35, in room 629 of the courthouse.  Plea hearing scheduled for 08-4-2015 at 01:30 pm.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Errol C Collins in court with attorney Allison Marie Ritter.  Denis John Stingl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defense counsel needs discovery.  Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 7.  Status conference scheduled for 06-23-2015 at 01:30 pm.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
Received and filed with court.

Defendant Errol C Collins in court with attorney Allison Marie Ritter.  Hanna Ritchie Kolberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Thomas McAdams, Branch 07.  Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pled not guilty. Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference to Branch 07.  Scheduling conference scheduled for June 9, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Filed, Justice Point Pretrial REport dated 5/15/15.

15RM023853  Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff:
05/10/2015

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION.    No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  
Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Defendant Errol C Collins in court with attorney Louis Edward Epps.  Defendant Errol C Collins in custody.  
Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge McAdams, Branch 7.  
Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  
DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  

Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 18, 2015 at 01:30 pm.


Case recalled at 12:09pm
Commissioner advised DNA sample has been obtained from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant he may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he/she meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4).
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
